title: East of England All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: To bring together East of England's MPs and Peers with elected local council leaders, directly elected mayors and police, crime and fire commissioners â€“ as well as senior representatives from the private and third sectors - to give a strong political voice for policies which support the East of England's economy and environment and promote its potential as a place to work, study, live, visit and invest.
